State 1.description: Log into Powerchart as User A
State 1.Name: Step 1

State 1.description: Navigate to message center,From the communicate open message option
State 1.Name: Step 2

State 1.description: Load the patient with the specific encounter
State 1.Name: Step 3

State 1.description: Click on any of the relationship on the patient
State 1.Name: Step 5

State 1.description: Load the patient with 2nd encounter and click on the summary view
State 1.Name: Step 6

State 1.description: Load user B and send the message
State 1.Name: Step 7

State 1.description: Go to view menu and select Home option. Select Inbox tab and any item..
State 1.Name: Step 8

State 1.description: Click on Change icon from the Framework toolbar.  Enter User B’s credentials.
State 1.Name: Step 9

State 1.description: Navigate to message center,Open sent message and click on summary view
State 1.Name: Step 10

State 10.description: Open the reminders folder under Work Items.
State 10.Name: Step 91

State 10.description: Select reminder from the communication dropdown.
State 10.Name: Step 92

State 10.description: In show-up field enter 3 and select the week(s) from the drop down
State 10.Name: Step 93

State 10.description: In Show-up field enter 7 and select month(s) from the drop down
State 10.Name: Step 94

State 10.description: Highlight the CC message identified in the prerequisites. Right click. Select open patient chart and select clinical note tab
State 10.Name: Step 97

State 10.description: Return to the Message Center. From the Inbox menu select Manage Configuration.
State 10.Name: Step 98

State 10.description: Select the messages folder & re-order the columns
State 10.Name: Step 99

State 10.description: Remove any one column from the active columns list for the messages folder.
State 10.Name: Step 100

State 11.description: Deselect the reminders folder from the configuration.
State 11.Name: Step 101

State 11.description: Click OK. Open the messages folder.
State 11.Name: Step 103

State 11.description: Login to Preferences Maintenance Tool (PrefMaint.exe), set Full Message Center as Pane 1 for the home view and set Scheduling as Pane 2 for User A’s Position
State 11.Name: Step 105

State 11.description: Login to Powerchart Application as User A, navigate to message center, Select Home from view menu.  Open the prerequisite message with lengthy text  in the body.
State 11.Name: Step 106

State 11.description: Click the right arrow to maximize the opened message.
State 11.Name: Step 107

State 11.description: Click the left arrow to minimize the message.
State 11.Name: Step 108

State 11.description: Select Message center from View menu and go to messages folder.
State 11.Name: Step 109

State 11.description: Resize the Inbox summary by dragging towards right.
State 11.Name: Step 110

State 12.description: Click on Pool tab and Select Pool B, go messages folder, Drag the inbox  summary to resize.
State 12.Name: Step 111

State 2.description: Close the summary view and click on reply button
State 2.Name: Step 13

State 2.description: Navigate to message center, go to messages folder and open any message.
State 2.Name: Step 16

State 2.description: Go to task menu, Select Exit option.
State 2.Name: Step 17

State 2.description: Select any Key notification from the framework.
State 2.Name: Step 19

State 2.description: Go to view menu and select Home option
State 2.Name: Step 20

State 3.description: Hit the  key to highlight the document.  Select Inbox from the Menu and select Preview  Pane option
State 3.Name: Step 22

State 3.description: Relaunch PowerChart as user A, Navigate to  message center. 'Under the Inbox menu select  View read only inbox.
State 3.Name: Step 25

State 3.description: Enter user B in the field
State 3.Name: Step 27

State 3.description: Add the user to the Send to field, and click ok.
State 3.Name: Step 28

State 3.description: Load the messages folder. Select any item
State 3.Name: Step 29

State 4.description: Select the personnel search option within the Read Only tab TOC, search for Pool A, and click ok in the address book.
State 4.Name: Step 33

State 4.description: Load the results folder. Select any item
State 4.Name: Step 34

State 4.description: Under the Inbox menu select View read only inbox.
State 4.Name: Step 37

State 4.description: Select the Home component from View menu, go to Results folder, with the prerequisite result.
State 4.Name: Step 38

State 4.description: Select the  key to move focus to the TOC.  Use the arrow keys on the keyboard to navigate  to another category or subfolder within Inbox  Items. Select the  key.
State 4.Name: Step 39

State 4.description: Return to the Results, go to the inbox menu and select manage configuration.
State 4.Name: Step 40

State 5.description: Click Ok in commit progress popup.
State 5.Name: Step 44

State 5.description: Open the Renewal Request subfolder under Priority Items.
State 5.Name: Step 45

State 5.description: Highlight the pre-requisite renewal request  message
State 5.Name: Step 46

State 5.description: Search for Patient A and Navigate to Patient A’s Chart Overview tab, Click on This visit tab
State 5.Name: Step 50

State 6.description: Click on 1 Messages under the Communication section.
State 6.Name: Step 51

State 6.description: Type some text.  Check the delete  checkbox &  send the message.
State 6.Name: Step 54

State 6.description: Go back chart for Pt A.
State 6.Name: Step 56

State 6.description: Click on the Consult Reminder link under the communicate dropdown.
State 6.Name: Step 58

State 6.description: Change the Display field for the date range to  Last 1 day.
State 6.Name: Step 59

State 7.description: Change the Display field for the date range back to 60 days.
State 7.Name: Step 61

State 7.description: Launch the Date Control and select a custom date from the calendar.
State 7.Name: Step 62

State 7.description: Change the Display field for the date range back to 60 days.
State 7.Name: Step 63

State 7.description: Launch the Date Control and select the custom  date from the calendar as in the previous step 53.
State 7.Name: Step 64

State 7.description: From the Inbox menu, select Manage Configuration.
State 7.Name: Step 65

State 7.description: Select results folder, Re-order the columns by clicking up and down arrow
State 7.Name: Step 66

State 7.description: Attempt to remove a column from the results
State 7.Name: Step 67

State 7.description: Attempt to deselect one of the active categories for the configuration
State 7.Name: Step 68

State 7.description: Click OK in commit progress popup.
State 7.Name: Step 70

State 8.description: Change user & log in as User B. Navigate to  message center. Enable Preview Pane for User B by selecting  Inbox Menu -> Show Preview Pane.
State 8.Name: Step 71

State 8.description: Select Manage on the Pool tab.
State 8.Name: Step 73

State 8.description: Close the setup dialog of Manage the Pool.
State 8.Name: Step 74

State 8.description: Right click on the demographic bar.
State 8.Name: Step 77

State 8.description: Deselect one of the existing fields and add a new field in its place to the demographic bar.  Select OK to ensure the changes.
State 8.Name: Step 78

State 8.description: Refresh the Message Center and reopen the reminder
State 8.Name: Step 79

State 8.description: Close Reminder 1.  Highlight the reminder. Press  key on the keyboard.
State 8.Name: Step 80

State 9.description: Select Message folder and from the Display field, select the Load All option.
State 9.Name: Step 82

State 9.description: Re-select the default date range from calendar. Open a patient chart and from framework within the chart, click on key notification CRIT 2.
State 9.Name: Step 83

State 9.description: Select the result item in the list view
State 9.Name: Step 84

State 9.description: Hit the  key to open the result or double click to open the result.
State 9.Name: Step 85

State 9.description: Select the Summary View Toggle Button
State 9.Name: Step 86

State 9.description: Toggle back to the inbox view and Endorse  the result
State 9.Name: Step 87
